backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining color tokens, theming, and global background/text rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing SEO metadata and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in the CartProvider.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Displays a product card with image, details, formatted INR price, and add‑to‑cart action.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper including the global background, header, footer, and routed page outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/YogaMorph: Animated background component cycling yoga pose images with crossfade, noise overlay, and reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteF: Footer with brand info, Instagram link, support contact details, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteH: Responsive site header with navigation links, cart button, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/data/copy.ts: Static marketing copy defining hero text, philosophy sections, launch info, and footer content.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines Product interface and a catalog of product objects including yoga mats and resistance bands.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting the user's reduced motion preference via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useYogaBackgroundDiag: Development hook that preloads yoga background assets and logs warnings for any failed loads.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color tokens, typography, and layered background textures.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Formats numbers into INR currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Provides login and signup forms with client-side validation and tabbed UI.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, removal actions, and an empty-cart fallback.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows product catalog with category filtering, grouping, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including empty cart, payment selection, and order confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the hero section, featured categories, and navigation to catalog filters.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 message with navigation options to home or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: React page showing detailed product info with image, description, features, quantity controls, and add‑to‑cart behavior using router params.
frontend/src/qa/background-regression-ch: QA checklist for verifying yoga morphing background loading, animation behavior, accessibility, layering, and production readiness.
frontend/src/store/cart.tsx: React context managing cart state with add, update, remove, clear, and computed totals for items and subtotal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing IKIGAI site scope, design guidelines, features, known issues, and version tracking.
